title: mlflow serve model from s3
body:
Hi Team,

          We are storing artifacts in s3 storage , now i wanted to serve the modle as rest api which are located in s3, but unfortunately the model is not finding from remote s3 storage .Please help to serve the model from s3 location . Thanks


### mlflow command 
mlflow pyfunc serve -m s3://mlflowdemo/00c9d82931624f22b6af1b9f0e59d5e4/artifacts/model -p 11234

### Error
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/bin/mlflow", line 10, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 764, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 717, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1137, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 956, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/click/core.py", line 555, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/pyfunc/cli.py", line 66, in serve
    model_env_file = _load_model_env(model_path)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/pyfunc/__init__.py", line 265, in _load_model_env
    return _get_flavor_configuration(model_path=path, flavor_name=FLAVOR_NAME).get(ENV, None)
  File "/Users/f7wu/mlflow_demo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/utils/model_utils.py", line 24, in _get_flavor_configuration
    RESOURCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST)
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Could not find an "MLmodel" configuration file at "s3://mlflowdemo/00c9d82931624f22b6af1b9f0e59d5e4/artifacts/model"
